mapper.select: SELECT * FROM workout WHERE workoutname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR catename LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') ORDER BY workoutid
mapper.insert: INSERT workdiary(workcatename, email, worktime, workdiarydate) VALUES (#{workcatename}, #{email}, #{worktime}, curdate())
mapper.select: SELECT w.email, wd.workdiarydate, ROUND(SUM(w.weight * wc.mets * wd.worktime), 1) AS workcal, SUM(wd.worktime) AS worktime FROM weight w JOIN workdiary wd ON wd.email = w.email JOIN workcate wc ON wc.catename = wd.workcatename WHERE w.email = #{email} AND wd.workdiarydate = #{seldate} AND w.weightdate = ( SELECT MAX(w2.weightdate) FROM weight w2 WHERE w2.email = w.email ) GROUP BY w.email, wd.workdiarydate
